readFromServer() - Method in class clueClient.Client
Purpose:
Preconditions:
Postconditions:
Pseudo-Code:
BEGIN
- read a non-empty string from the server (from the ClientSocket connection)
- tokenize the string (by spaces) and parse its first word
- IF the first word is "update"
- -
- ELSE IF the first word is "yourturn"
- -
- ELSE IF the first word is "havecard"
- -
- ELSE IF the first word is "choosecard"
- -
- ELSE IF the first word is "inform"
- -
- ELSE IF the first word is "gameover"
- -
END

LAST MODIFIED: Michael Philippone, 13 DEC 2008

relocate(int, int, int) - Method in class clueServer.Pieces
Public Method: relocate
Purpose: updates a players position after a move has been selected

Precondition: a move was made
Postcondition: player has been repositioned
RGBColors - Static variable in class utils.Utilities
PART 03 of the coloring scheme (see BoardColors[] for more information)
Array representing all of the RGB color values corresponding to color choices named in BoardColors[]
This is used both for both client and server side components, and allows an easy changing of the color choices
Roll() - Method in class clueServer.Dice
Public Method: Roll
Purpose: generates a number similar to rolling a die.
Room - Variable in class clueServer.GameBoard
contains all the information of the room and null space locations
roomNames - Static variable in class utils.Utilities
Array representing the names of the rooms on the board This will allow easy changing of rooms' names for customizing the experience.
Rooms - Class in clueServer
Class semantics and roles:
Rooms maintains a group of positions for cells that are rooms on the board or are null spaces on the board (around player positions and board middle)

Information maintenance:
Creation: Rooms is created at start up by GameBoard
Deletion: Rooms is deleted when the game has finished or otherwise been terminated.
Rooms() - Constructor for class clueServer.Rooms
Constructor: creates the rooms and null spaces
Parameters: none
Rooms.position - Class in clueServer
Private Class: position
Purpose: creates an object to act as a struct for holding two properties that will need to be used together throughout Pieces.
Rooms.position(int, int) - Constructor for class clueServer.Rooms.position
Constructor: takes an X coordinate, Y coordinate and makes an X, Y pair
RoomsTest - Class in testPages
Class semantics and roles:
This class is used to test the functionality of the Rooms class and its methods.
RoomsTest() - Constructor for class testPages.RoomsTest
 
run() - Method in class clueClient.Client
